items.title: On-screen movie kill counts for hundreds of films
items.description:
This file contains the on-screen death counts for roughly 550 films.

The data in this file were scraped from www.MovieBodyCounts.com and tallied according to the web site's counting guidelines: http://moviebodycounts.proboards.com/index.cgi?board=general&action=display&thread=6

All of the films and the details of the tallies are at: http://www.moviebodycounts.com/movies.htm

If you would like to update an entry in this list, please email Randy Olson at olsonran@msu.edu

A blog post describing the data in more detail is linked below.
